text: “Nɨ gumazir kam inigh danganir ia itimɨn azenan mangɨ. Eghtɨ gumazir a na mɨkemezir akar kuraba baraghiziba, me bar uan dafariba an dapanim darɨkigh. Me kamaghɨn damightɨ, gumazamiziba fogham, gumazir kam arazir kuram gamigha osɨmtɨzim iti. Eghtɨ gumazamiziba bar dagɨaba fɨva a mɨkɨntɨ an aremegham.
